meanings.definition: The action of moving one's hand or an object back and forth against a surface.
meanings.sent1: She did the rubbing on the paper to make a drawing.
meanings.sent2: I felt the rubbing of the cloth against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The rubbing of the eraser on the mistake made it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The rubbing of the waves against the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The rubbing of the cat against my leg was comforting.

meanings.definition: The act of applying pressure and friction to a part of the body to relieve pain or stiffness.
meanings.sent1: The rubbing of the ointment on his sore muscles helped him feel better.
meanings.sent2: She felt relief from the rubbing of the massage therapist's hands on her back.
meanings.sent3: The rubbing of the ice pack on his injury made him shiver.
meanings.sent4: The rubbing of the warm towel on her neck was like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The rubbing of the lotion on her dry skin made it soft and smooth.
